132.movie_plot: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

121.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)

134.movie_plot: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

124.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

150.movie_plot: Documentary about an aspiring filmmaker's attempts to finance his dream project by finally completing the low-budget horror film he abandoned years before.

136.movie_plot: Private Luc Deveraux and his sadistic sergeant, Andrew Scott, got killed in Vietnam. The army uses their bodies for a secret project - reanimating dead soldiers as deadly obedient cyborgs. However, their memories come back too.

133.movie_plot: A young girl receives a vision that drives her to rid France of its oppressors.

152.movie_plot: A washed up pitcher flashes through his career.

120.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

146.movie_plot: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

154.movie_plot: Several years after the previous serial took place, Professor Quatermass is trying to perfect a dangerously unstable nuclear-powered rocket engine. After a disastrous test firing in ...

145.movie_name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972)

116.movie_plot: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

117.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

126.movie_plot: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

63.movie_plot: A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.

82.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)

79.movie_plot: The life and career of a legendary comedian, Andy Kaufman.

2.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

113.movie_plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

72.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

6.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

88.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)

Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

98.movie_plot: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

5.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

8.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

67.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

24.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

59.movie_plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.
